Pyro Grass.description: Grass adapted to this hot region.

Pyro Soil.description: Soil adapted to this hot region.

Blackstone.description: Stones burnt up from this hot region.

Hellstone.description: Is this actually from hell? Probably not.

Blood Sage.description: Not actually made of blood believe it or not.

Surface Gold Ore.description: Who woulda thought you would find gold here?

Pyro Tall Grass.description: Someone needs to mow their lawn.

Smooth Ash.description: Probably feels nice to walk on.

Bones.description: I guess this means someone died here.

Fossil.description: What kind of animal was this?

Burnt Tall Grass.description: This is why you don't mow your lawn with a flamethrower.

Grass.description: The grass is greener on the other side.

Tall Grass.description: Someone needs to mow their lawn.

Bush.description: Could do with a hedge for my house. Oh actually I can't afford a house. Or a hedge.

Snowglobe.description: It's winter year round in there.

Sunflower.description: Sunflowers always face the sun, well I only made one sprite for them so I guess the sun is always south.

Wheat.description: Agriculture was the most monumental turning point in human history. Or maybe not I'm just saying stuff.

Sign.description: Sometimes all you need is a sign.

Blue Flax.description: Would you really add your favorite flower to the game and barely any others? Yes, yes I would.

Snowpile.description: Call the kids its a snowday!

Rubber Tree.description: You can probably get some rubber out of them.

Jungle Grass.description: This grass is pretty damn green.

Mud.description: It's like imagine dirt was wet, wouldn't that be fun?

Pumpkin.description: For some reason someone around here doesn't like you farming pumpkins.

Watermelon.description: Sometimes watermelon don't want to be farmed.

Jungle Bush.description: I feel like something could easily be hiding in here.

Mahogany Tree.description: Nothing like good ol sturdy mahogany.

Jungle Water.description: The Amazon is possibly the longest river in the world.

Mango Tree.description: Reminds me of a certain youtuber.

Sugarcane.description: Taste good, I guess its the sugar.

Swamp Leaves.description: Just some leaves idk what you expected me to say.

Mangrove Tree.description: Did you know there are three types of mangroves?

Swamp Water.description: I dare you to take a swim in it.

Lilypad.description: Aw just a cute little lilypad.

Sky.description: Did you know that the sky is blue because it's feeling sad? Maybe check up on it sometimes.

Sand.description: It's course, and rough, and it gets everywhere.

Seashells.description: She sells seashells on the sea shore.

Coconut Tree.description: You think you fell out of a coconut tree?

Clear Water.description: Nothing like some beautiful water to swim in.

Pina Colada.description: It's a game why not take a vacation?

Chalk Soil.description: I guess they have to get chalk from somewhere.

Limestone.description: You could make a house out of this. I mean sea creatures do.

Pebbles.description: You could throw them at someone.

Twigs.description: Whoever finds the biggest stick wins.

Rock Flower.description: What do you mean this doesn't really exist?

Rail.description: Useful for transporting things, though maybe not in this state.

Boulder.description: You know you want to push me up a mountain.
